skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Tzeentch, and is affected by Tzeentch Authority.

ui_effects.localised_text: Fires of Tzeentch grants regeneration and weakness to fire upon an enemy unit

skillTree.localised_description: As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Tzeentch, and is affected by Tzeentch Authority.

ui_effects.localised_text: Fires of Tzeentch grants regeneration and weakness to fire upon an enemy unit

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Tzeentch, and is affected by Tzeentch Authority.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)
Fires of Tzeentch grants regeneration and weakness to fire upon an enemy unit

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -5
	(enemy armies in region)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

	(own armies in region)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Final Transmutation"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "Robes? Fool! We're going to battle, not a ball. Hand me my armour! ARMOUR!"
Spell after spell, grant the enemy no reprieve!
Magic is little threat to one so well-versed in its dark and terrible intricacies.
Sheathed in sorcery and guarded against attacks, the Spirit Warrior summons deadly flame.
A barrier of Tzeentchian magic surrounds the warriors of the Changer, guarding them from the tumult of close combat.
Devastating bolts of arcane fire strike the earth, igniting all in their radius.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Immorality is subjective.

effects.description:
Enemy vigour loss reduction: +1%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +3%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The Great Schemer brings ruin to all.

	(enemy armies in region)

	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy spell resistance: -6%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 4
Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
